prerequisite: Higher Chinese at GCE 'O' Level, GCE 'AO' Level Chinese or equivalent
moduleDescription: Chinese for Science & Technology is a special module for students who plan to do an exchange semester at Chinese universities. It focuses on an understanding of the forms of Chinese and Chinese usage appropriate to the fields of science, technology and computing. The course aims to enhance students’ Chinese proficiency in the academic context of science, engineering, and related fields.
